title: Alterations
description: Gigi, Ellen, Lilly… three women so desperate to change their lives that they turn to the mysterious Dr. Kite, who offers them an implant that can control their mind.Will Gigi find her true love? Can Ellen’s miraculous, sudden weight loss bring her romance and self-respect? Can Lilly put her bitter divorce behind her? They’re willing to risk it all to find the happiness they’ve always searched for.But sometimes your deepest desire can become your worst nightmare.To continue the story, read "Game Changer": Book 2 of the Alterations Trilogy ...
author: Jane Suen
